related_post.text: So I was trying my old method```gofunc login(username string password string){ body := url.Values{} body.Add("username username) body.Add("password password) fmt.Println(body.Encode()) time.Sleep(5 time.Second) req err := http.NewRequest("POST https://www.instagram.com/accounts/login/ajax/",strings.NewReader(body.Encode()))```But for some reason req is like this:```&{POST https://www.instagram.com/accounts/login/ajax/ HTTP/1.1 1 1 map[] {0xc00016a040} 0x62cc00 42 [] false www.instagram.com map[] map[] <nil> map[] <nil> <nil> <nil> 0xc0000120f8}```When I need it to be like this:https://www.instagram.com/accounts/login/ajax/username=USERNAMEHERE&password=PASSWORDHERE

comments: Aribellah asks question and Nazaret provides So answer
